LESS: THE System SHALL PREVENT hazardous unintended acceleration
THE Engine_Control_Unit SHALL protect torque_signals_affecting_requirements_of_other_ECUs BY USING a signal_compound
THE Engine_Control_Unit SHALL DETECT AND confirm undesired High driving_torque state
IF undesired High driving_torque IS detected THEN THE Engine_Control_Unit SHALL SWITCH TO safe_state
IF acceleration IS NOT intended THEN THE Engine_Control_Unit SHALL SWITCH TO safe_state
THE Power_Switch SHALL DETECT spoofing OF THE Lamp_switch_on_request BY VERIFYING its MAC
THE Power_Switch SHALL drop Lamp_switch_on_request THAT are detected AS spoofed
IF A request IS made THEN THE Body_Control_ECU SHALL generate a MAC FOR THE Lamp_switch_on_request

LESS: THE Body_Control_ECU SHALL transmit THE generated MAC OF THE Lamp_switch_on_request WITH its own MAC
THE Gateway SHALL NOT transfer signals FROM THE Navigation_ECU TO THE Headlamp_system EXCEPT FOR signals_in_white_list
